      • buyPiece

        public void buyPiece(int playerIndex,
                     PieceType piece)
              throws NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException,
                     InvalidPieceTypeException,
                     NotEnoughResourcesException
        This function is the external access to purchasing a piece.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is purchasing the piece.
        piece - The PieceType which will be bought.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException
        InvalidPieceTypeException
        NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException

      • buyDevCard

                throws NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException,
                       NotEnoughResourcesException
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is buying a development card.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException
        NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException

      • payOutResources

        public void payOutResources(ResourceList[] resLists)
                     throws NotEnoughBankResourcesException
        This is the external call for generating resources for the CatanModel.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughBankResourcesException

      • acceptPlayerTrade

        public void acceptPlayerTrade(int playerIndex)
                       throws NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException,
                              InvalidPlayerIndexException,
                              TradeOfferNullException
        Called when accepting the current Trade Offer.
        Parameters:
        int - player index of the player accepting the trade offer. This index must be match the index of the player receiving the offer.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException
        InvalidPlayerIndex
        InvalidPlayerIndexException
        TradeOfferNullException

      • tradeWithBank

        public void tradeWithBank(ResourceList resList,
                          int toPlayerIndex)
                   throws NotEnoughBankResourcesException,
                          NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException
        Parameters:
        resList - ResourceList with the positive numbers going to the player and the negative numbers coming from the Bank.
        toPlayerIndex - The index of the player who is trading with the bank.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughPlayerResourcesException
        NotEnoughBankResourcesException

      • useMonopolyCard

        public void useMonopolyCard(int playerIndex,
                            ResourceType resource)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is using the card.
        resource - The resource that the player is asking for.

        public void useYearOfPlentyCard(int playerIndex,
                                ResourceList resourcesAskedFor)
                         throws NotEnoughBankResourcesException,
                                InvalidNumberOfResourcesRequested
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is using the card.
        resourcesAskedFor - The ResourceList with the two resources requested.
        Throws:
        InvalidNumberOfResourcesRequested
        NotEnoughBankResourcesException
